result.execSummary:
The defendant Ryan A. Vollrath was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Possession of THC [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: Concurrent to each other and concurrent to 2011CF794.

miscConds.notes: Good faith effort to obtain and maintain fulltime employment and/or school.

Counseling.
Defendant eligible to apply for expungement. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Case called: 11:01am.  Clerk: Denise. Includes 11CF794, 14CF339. State appears by ADA Lance Leonhard. Defendant appears by Atty Robin Kennedy. Matter set for 2nd Mtn to Revoke on 11CF794 and Plea/Sentencing 14CF339. *VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed 14CF339. State moves to amend ct 1 (bj-felony) to 1 ct of misd bj/repeater (946.49(1)(a) 14CF339 - crt grants. State moves to amend ct 1 (poss thc/2nd sub/repeater) to 1 ct of (poss thc/repeater) 14CF339- crt grants. PLEA: GUILTY - amend ct 1 (misd bj/repeater); amend ct 1 (poss thc/repeater) 14CF339. Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  Crt address 11CF794. Crt enters Judgment on ct 1 (poss w/intent thc/party to) 11CF794. Statements by State. Atty Kennedy makes statement. Defendant makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS: 11CF794 - SWH - 3 yrs probation. DNA Samle & Surcharge (Stipulation to pay). 
COURT ORDERS: 14CF399- SWH - 2 yrs probation, concurrent to each other and concurren to 11CF794. CONDITIONS: Impose & Stay 60 days MCJ on ct 1 in 14CF339 for rule violations; Counseling; AODA; Absolute Sobriety; Good faith effort to obtain and maintain fulltime employment and/or school; Court Costs. Crt informs & defendant signs Ineligible Voting Form in 11CF794. Defendant eligible to apply for Expungement. Adjourned: 11:19am.
Plea hearing on May 13, 2014 at 10:50 am.
and Demand for Discovery and Inspection
